name: todolistapp
description: ## Steps  1. Make sure node is installed. Open the VS Code terminal ctrl+`  ```bash      node -v  ```  1. Make sure npm is installed. By default node installes npm node package  manager. Check that __npm__ is installed  ```npm       npm -v  ```

scripts.start: npm run static && npx parcel src/index.html
scripts.dev: npm run static && npx parcel src/index.html
scripts.build: npm run static && npx parcel build src/index.html

author: Nina
